phrases: RED BLOOD CELLS: They carry oxygen and carbon dioxide using blood circulation.
I will catch up in no time!
I will be taking my time, okay?
BAD OMEN 2: Walking under a ladder
I just warned you, and you are passing under a ladder!
I will pick it all up for you!
I am getting a really bad vibe.
Show me who you really are!
You have progressed the most, and so, you passed yourself off as a harmless cell,
hoping to lure us out, is not that right?
You think you let your two allies get away from the enemy territory, do not you?
I see you are not rattled at all.
It would have saved me a lot of trouble if I had the three of you in one place.
CANCER CELL: Cells that proliferate wildly when there is an anomaly in the cell's genes.
Invading the boundaries between themselves and surrounding normal cells, they proliferate endlessly.
Cells that proliferate wildly when there is an anomaly in the cell's genes.
Invading the boundaries between themselves and surrounding normal cells,
I did not let them get away.
They were in my way, that is all.
After all, they could not even see through your disguise.
You could have just wreaked havoc anywhere random,
but you chose to come here and give that elaborate performance.
You have got something up your sleeve, am I right?
Tell me what it is, Cancer Cell!
It was all I could do not to burst out laughing, and I still played along the whole time!
Come on, let me enjoy myself a little longer!
Hey, that is not half bad, you know.
Well, excuse me and my lame attacks!
Now then, what am I going to do with him?
WHITE BLOOD CELLS (NEUTROPHILS): Their main task is to eliminate foreign substances from outside, such as bacteria and viruses.
Let us turn back and meet up with NK and the other one.
KILLER T CELLS (CYTOTOXIC T CELLS): Mobilize under orders from the Helper T Cells.
They kill virus-infected cells, Cancer Cells and the like.
GOING OUTSIDE IS PROHIBITED DO NOT TAKE THIS OFF
Does this mean that the cells here are ignoring the normal proliferation program?
PROLIFERATION: Unable to suppress cell proliferation, Cancer Cells self-proliferate at an unchecked rate.
They are busting through their cell membranes.
INFILTRATION: Cancer cells can moisten the cell walls of normal cells around them.
They really did a number on the surrounding tissue, too!
METASTASIS: Cancer cells travel through the blood vessels and lymph ducts, spreading to other parts of the body, and widening the scope of their activity.
And just look at these moving boxes, organized so neatly!
The cells that were here are not...
There is so many of them!
Dammit, where did they all come from?
NK and Cell are in danger!
You need to worry about yourself and this time and place instead of others!
All that bluster, and this is how you end up?
The two of you sure seem to be sitting pretty yourselves!
Do not be such a sore loser!
You have always been a loose cannon!
Why do not you shut up, idiot?
You morons did not even notice the Cancer Cell in our midst!
Do not fight at a time like this!
Where is that young cell kid?
If you are looking for that one, there he is!
I see all three of you are here.
So that makes it three against one, I guess.
That cell kid is a Cancer Cell?
When he was being chased earlier...
Meaning he and his friends put on a performance?
Now that all three of you are here, I will be glad to clue you in.
Lady, you were keen to know why I am doing this, were not you?
I wanted to let you experience it.
How it feels to get ganged up on
and massacred so violently by you Immune Cells!
So he would already taken over this whole building?
This is why I told you I would handle this on my own.
You wusses do not stand a chance against the enemy.
Because you are only going to get hurt.
They aggregate when the blood vessels are damaged, and cover the wounds.
It is Big Sister Red Blood Cell!
Cannot get over how peaceful it is, huh, Senpai?
Come to think of it, those bad vibes I was getting earlier...
I guess I was just imagining things after all?
Did you see that guy just now?
That was some gigantic load of nutrients, he was carrying, huh?
Looked like a lot to handle.
What is the deal with this huge load of nutrients?
We thought it was weird, too, but we just got a giant order.
They are telling us to keep'them coming.
It is this housing complex that placed the order.
Are there really that many cells living here?
Why do not we take a peek inside?
HOW CANCER CELLS WORK: Cancer cells release massive amounts of a substance called inflammatory cytokine.
This draws nutrient-rich blood to them on a preferential basis, contributing to Cancer Cell proliferation.
If this persists, it upsets the body's balance in various ways.
We will just leave this outside!
Hey, this cannot be a good thing, right?
If they consume this amount of nutrients, this body's overall energy will...
You are right, it is not a good thing.
But we are being told to keep the deliveries coming, so...
It seems really sketchy, but let us help out, too.
Find them and make sure they are eliminated!
Your copying error made us look like fools!
HOW MANY CANCER CELLS ARE PRODUCED IN 1 DAY: Due to copying errors that occur when normal cells divide, Cancer Cells are produced at a rate of several thousand a day, even in healthy people.
H-Hey, are we going to get killed even though we were only just born?
What do they mean by copying error?
But for now, let us just try to escape together!
Smoke him out no matter what and murder him!
Did you call me a goddamn bug?
And you are going to kill me?
Damn you, treating me like a defect!
Who the hell do you guys think you are?
Why should we have to get killed?
We have never done anything wrong!
All we did was come into this world!
I am going to murder the three of you instead!
It will not be long now!
Why are you in such a rush?
I am not really sure why,
but we are getting tons of orders from that housing complex right there!
Something strange is going on with that complex!
A type of White Blood Cell.
Captures and kills foreign substances such as bacteria, and finds antigens and immunity information.
Now, we are going to scatter all over the body via the blood vessels and lymph ducts.
That is where we are going to proliferate, and then kill every last one of your friends.
By knocking all you normal cells down from the killers' side to the victims' side,
all the way to rock bottom!
There is no way this world can be sustained by the power of lunatic cells!
You can try all you want,
but the only thing in store for you is annihilation!
That is just fine with me.
After all, it is my fate to die.
That is the one thing I will not let you get away with!
A type of Lymphocyte that fights antigens by producing weapons called antibodies.
You are finished, you damn Cancer Cell!
I was aiming for his head, but I seem to have missed!
Just like you said, Red Blood Cell, this place is teeming with strange cells!
Killing them will be so rewarding!
Just when I thought he was nowhere to be seen, there is White Blood Cell!
HELPER T CELLS: They relay information and countermeasure strategies for foreign enemies to other cells.
We, Immune Cells, have you completely surrounded!
You going to sit there forever?
We are going to take that bastard out
You do not have to tell me!
Losing to those Cancer Cells is not an option!
Let us do it for this world!
It is a horde of Cancer Cells!
Goodness, what an idiot you are!
What do you think you are doing?
I am telling you, this is totally killing me!
Laughing my head off gave me a shot in the arm!
I will be happy to explain!
NK CELL'S REVITALIZATION: Transmitters called neuropeptides are produced when the brain is stimulated through laughter.
These bind to the surface of the NK cells, revitalizing them.
Oh man, I was this close, too.
Mister, are you that White Blood Cell from before?
What do you want with me?
You have got some bitter words for me?
How dare you lie to us?
Why do not you just say something already?
I was just thinking how you are a cell, too.
You may not have the strength to move anymore,
but it looks like you can still talk, huh?
if you have anything to say, I will be happy to hear you out.
Pretending to be such a nice guy...
When I disguised myself as a normal cell, and you rescued me, I...
That just made me so happy, you know?
Since it was the first time in my life that anyone had ever rescued me...
There is not a single cell in this world who would try to save a cell like me.
I am really just a cell, you know!
I should have gotten the chance to just live in peace every day with you all,
as a member of this world!
We, Immune Cells, cannot save you.
You defy the rules of this body,
proliferating, stealing nutrients and destroying normal tissue.
We can neither let you live nor repair you.
you are all just going to forget!
My grudge, my anger, my grief...
They are all just going to fade away, never to be heard!
And it will be like they never existed.
Thanks to a cell division gone wrong,
the Immune Cells that should have been my allies went after me!
And now I am going to die without leaving my mark in this world!
Why was I ever born in the first place?
I have no choice but to kill you.
I will gladly lose to you.
Is he the enemy you fought today?
I have already finished him off.
I will gladly lose to you.
Cancer Cell, please do not ever come here again!
By the way, Red Blood Cell...
You are the one who summoned the other Immune Cells, right?
By the way, what were you talking about just now?
Even if we do meet again,
we, Immune Cells, will bring you down for sure!
I am going around the blood flow by myself!
Next episode of Cells at Work!,
Hey, we ran into each other again, White Blood Cell!
It is not like I tagged along, all right?
